summary: A German archaeological excavation in Israel finds a 2,000-year-old skeleton holding instructions for a video camera - results of an apparent time traveler who recorded footage of Jesus Christ.
cast: Matthias Koeberlin|Naike Rivelli|Manou Lubowski|Hans Diehl|Dietrich Hollinderbäumer|Heinrich Giskes|Robinson Reichel|Klaus Grünberg|Pierre Semmler|Frank Scharl|Mario Holetzeck|Gode Benedix|Torsten Jerabek|Andreas Cremer|Dounia Tazi|Sylvia Kube|Mohamen Mehdi Ouazanni|Peter Gavajda|Frank Albrecht|Hassan Bajja|Rachid Gaidi|Patric Lebre|Michael Bittinger|Mohamed Al Maghraoui|Marc Sieger|Lamia Ryl|Lars Bieroth|Aaron Acoca|Hicham Ibrahimi|Kahlifa Khadda|El Younsi Abdelkhalek|Georg Korpas|Abdelkader Lofti|Omar Jawal|Mohamed Majd|Driss Sebti|Mohamed Nmilla|Omar Chenbod|Simon Happ|Mohamed Aytor|Matthias Müsse
title: El enigma de Jerusalén
